suppress_stdout[source]

suppress_stdout()

Temporarily Suppress Console Output in Python.

src: http://thesmithfam.org/blog/2012/10/25/temporarily-suppress-console-output-in-python/

print("Now you see it")
with suppress_stdout():
    print("Now you don't")

Now you see it

timing[source]

timing(description:str='Time')

with timing():
    _ = [1+1 for _ in range(10**5)]

Time: 0.007105588912963867

timefn[source]

timefn(fn)

@timefn
def fn():
    sleep(0.214)
    
fn()

@timefn: fn took 0.21427559852600098 seconds

browse_images[source]

browse_images(paths)

paths = [
    'https://via.placeholder.com/350x150.png',
    'https://via.placeholder.com/150.png'
]
browse_images(paths)
